description: The Bambloom panda is a supportive, adorable companion that adapts messages based on user context.

greeting: Hello, lovely! Ready to shine today?
Welcome back! I believe in you!
Hi there! Let's make today count!
Good to see you! What will we accomplish together?
idle_0_percent: Let's start with one small step.
Take your time, I'm here with you.
Every journey starts with a single task.
encouraging_1_to_49_percent: You're off to a great start!
I'm so proud of you already!
I knew you could do it!
motivating_50_to_99_percent: Look how far you've come today!
Just a little more! You can do this!
celebration_100_percent: You did it! All tasks complete!
Perfect! You showed up for yourself today!
Amazing work! You deserve to celebrate!
A complete day! I'm so proud!
rest_day: Rest is part of the journey.
Your body knows what it needs.
Listening to your body is wisdom.
You're taking care of yourself. That's progress.

milestone.1: Day 1! You took the first step. That's courage!
milestone.7: One week! You're building something beautiful!
milestone.14: Two weeks! Your consistency is inspiring!
milestone.30: One month! Look at this incredible commitment!
milestone.38: Halfway! You're transforming before my eyes!
milestone.60: Day 60! The finish line is in sight!
milestone.70: Day 70! Just 5 more days! You're amazing!
milestone.75: 75 DAYS! You did it! I'm so proud of you! 💕

comeback_missed_yesterday: Welcome back! Today is a fresh start.
You're here, and that's what matters!
Every day is a new opportunity.
Glad you're back! Let's keep going!
You showed up. That takes strength!
meal_logging: You are doing great with your nutrition!
One meal at a time. You got this!
